messages.content: Do your best to answer what is the  Harmonized System (HS) code of the following product, answer with the hs code only: YOURS Curve Grey Floral Print Cuffed Pyjama Bottoms

I chose HS code 610822 for the product "YOURS Curve Grey Floral Print Cuffed Pyjama Bottoms" based on the following:

- HS code 61 refers to "Articles of apparel and clothing accessories, knitted or crocheted"
- HS code 6108 refers to "Women's or girls' slips, petticoats, briefs, panties, nightdresses, pajamas, negligees, bathrobes, dressing gowns and similar articles, knitted or crocheted"
- HS code 610822 specifically refers to "Women's or girls' pajamas and nightdresses, knitted or crocheted, of cotton"

Since the product description mentions "pyjama bottoms" and "cuffed", it indicates it is a knitted or crocheted cotton nightwear/loungewear for women, hence HS code 610822 would be most appropriate.

The HS code system is based on the description, material composition, and intended use of the products. So I analyzed these attributes of the given product to determine the most suitable HS code for it.
